headline: Better Consumer Staples ETF: Vanguard's VDC vs. Invesco's RSPS
summary: Expense ratios, portfolio size, and weighting strategies set these two consumer staples ETFs apart for investors seeking sector exposure.

headline: SPGP’s 24.8% Sector Bet Only Requires One Thing to Beat The S&P 500
summary: If you want exposure to growing companies without paying the premium valuations that often come with pure growth funds, Invesco S&P 500 GARP ETF (NYSEARCA:SPGP) offers a middle path. This fund targets businesses inside the S&P 500 that combine revenue and earnings expansion with reasonable price multiples. It’s designed for investors who believe growth matters, ... SPGP’s 24.8% Sector Bet Only Requires One Thing to Beat The S&P 500

headline: Invesco’s SPHQ ETF Smoked The S&P 500 With A Simple Screen
summary: When most investors think about S&P 500 exposure, they picture owning the entire market. But what if you could filter that universe down to only the most financially sound companies? That’s the promise behind Invesco S&P 500 Quality ETF (NYSEARCA:SPHQ), a fund that screens for profitability, stability, and operational excellence rather than simply tracking market ... Invesco’s SPHQ ETF Smoked The S&P 500 With A Simple Screen
